item.title: On-off lamp
item.description: This example shows the basics of a state machine, also known by the more technical term finite state automaton. The idea is that the program is in a particular state, and certain events will cause a transition to another state. In our case, our light is either on or off (the states), and we will transition between them with a big enough vibration reading. Here is a state diagram of this:
